pullrequest.title: Simple demo and other tweaks -> pull request #186

content.raw:
@carromj , this PR grew beyond the demo I was adding. How do you feel about merging it into your PR so reviewers of that PR can see the final code? If you still want to discuss the demo, you could pull the code changes to that branch and leave just the demo here.

I was also thinking of adding a separate demo that uses levels, for completeness.
content.html:
@carromj , this PR grew beyond the demo I was adding. How do you feel about merging it into your PR so reviewers of that PR can see the final code? If you still want to discuss the demo, you could pull the code changes to that branch and leave just the demo here.

I was also thinking of adding a separate demo that uses levels, for completeness.
